title: HoP 191 - The Young Ones: Encounters with European Thought
itunes:title: HoP 191 - The Young Ones: Encounters with European Thought
description: 18th and 19th century intellectuals in India and the Ottoman empire, from Shāh Walī Allāh to the Young Turks, continue Islamic traditions and grapple with European science.
